text: Adada () is a 1987 South Korean film directed by Im Kwon-taek, based on a story by Kye Yong-mook. ==Synopsis== The film tells the story of a deaf-mute woman living in a small village in Korea during the 1920s. ==Cast== *Shin Hye- soo *Han Ji-il *Lee Geung-young *Kim Ji-young *Jeon Moo-song ==Awards== * Best Actress (Shin Hye-soo), Montreal World Film FestivalAwards based on ==Notes== ==Sources== * * == External links == * * Category:1987 films Category:Films directed by Im Kwon-taek Category:Korean-language films Category:South Korean films Category:South Korean drama films Category:Films set in Korea under Japanese rule
